etymologies: late 18th century. From Khoekhoe nenta, plant name

definitions: (A) Any of several poisonous plants of the family Crassulaceae, especially species of the genus Tylecodon (formerly Cotyledon). (b) The poisonous plant Lessertia annularis of the family Fabaceae (Leguminosae).

A disorder of goats and sheep characterized by torticollis, convulsions, colic, collapse, and often death, caused by the ingestion of any of a variety of poisonous plants, especially of the genus Tylecodon.
